attributes.action: Changing of Fry's Turkish Delight to Fry's Chocolate Covered Turkish Delight.
attributes.background: I brought a Fry's Turkish Delight Bar to find out that the Turkish Delight had been covered in chocolate, this is not clearly labelled on the packaging and if changed will stop people like myself being mislead.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament cannot impose regulations on a single named company. If you want the UK Government or Parliament to take action, for example on food labelling more generally, you could start a new petition specifically asking for that action.
